alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Douglas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 2:23PM EST until January 11 at 12:40AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Sweetwater Creek upstream of Railroad at Austell affecting Douglas and Cobb Counties. For the Sweetwater Creek...including Austell...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sweetwater Creek upstream of Railroad at Austell. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 19 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding of woodlands and the natural flood plain occurs upstream and downstream from the gage near the railroad bridge parallel to Joe Jerkins Boulevard. Large portions of Legion Park will be flooded with up to two feet of water. Low lying areas of Garrett Road... Westside Road and Stovall Road will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 18.9 feet and rising slowly. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 19.1 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1245 AM EST.
